alert.note: Alert for Maryland Beaches (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 08 at 9:20PM EST until January 10 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TUESDAY TO 1 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 8 to 12 feet expected in the surf zone. * WHERE...In Maryland, Maryland Beaches County. In Virginia, Northampton County. * WHEN...From 1 PM Tuesday to 1 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Beaches along the Atlantic coast including Ocean City and Assateague. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. OCEAN CITY INLET MD MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.0 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.5 FT, MAJOR 3.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 09/06 AM 3.5 1.0 1.3 1 NONE 09/06 PM 3.5 1.0 2.0 1 NONE 10/07 AM 2.8 0.3 0.5 1 NONE 10/07 PM 1.7 -0.8 0.1 1 NONE 11/08 AM 2.5 0.0 0.1 1 NONE NASSAWADOX CREEK AT BAYFORD VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.0 FT, MODERATE 3.5 FT, MAJOR 4.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.0 FT, MODERATE 1.5 FT, MAJOR 2.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 09/08 AM 2.7 0.7 0.8 2-3 NONE 09/08 PM 2.3 0.3 1.0 7-8 NONE 10/09 AM 3.2 1.2 1.2 5 MINOR 10/08 PM 1.8 -0.2 0.5 2-3 NONE 11/09 AM 2.3 0.3 0.3 1 NONE KIPTOPEKE VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 5.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.0 FT, MAJOR 2.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 09/06 AM 3.9 0.9 1.1 2-3 NONE 09/07 PM 3.4 0.4 1.3 6 NONE 10/07 AM 3.6 0.6 0.6 5 NONE 10/07 PM 2.3 -0.7 0.2 3-4 NONE 11/08 AM 3.5 0.5 0.4 2 NONE OYSTER VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 7.0 FT, MODERATE 7.5 FT, MAJOR 8.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 2.4 FT, MODERATE 2.9 FT, MAJOR 3.9 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 09/06 AM 6.5 1.9 1.1 1 NONE 09/07 PM 6.4 1.8 2.7 1 NONE 10/07 AM 5.7 1.1 -0.1 1 NONE 10/08 PM 3.6 -1.0 -0.3 1 NONE 11/08 AM 6.1 1.5 0.1 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: Large breaking waves will result in dangerous surf conditions and possible beach erosion. Do not enter or approach the water due to the risk of being swept away.
